definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: T&L Technology Co. is a Notebook Computer Repair Center.
sentences.chinese: 是一間提供專業手提電腦維修服務的公司。

sentences.english: He considered Founder laptops (to be) very good.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲方正手提電腦很好。

sentences.english: Carry index cards, a hand-held computer or a small notebook.
sentences.chinese: 隨身帶着卡片，手提電腦或是一個小筆記本。

sentences.english: You need to connect the cable on the desk to your laptop.
sentences.chinese: 你需要將桌上的網線和你的手提電腦連接起來。

sentences.english: Since Monday, my laptop has been giving me shit with wireless.
sentences.chinese: 前天開始，手提電腦就一直連不上無線網路。

sentences.english: When I turn 20, my parents will buy me a laptop.
sentences.chinese: 當我滿20歲後，我爸媽會給我買臺手提電腦。

sentences.english: Last week Professor Wang bought a laptop the size of half of a book.
sentences.chinese: 上星期王教授買了一個有半本書那麼大的手提電腦。

sentences.english: If you need to use a computer, it is suggested to bring your own laptop and internet cable here.
sentences.chinese: 如需使用電腦，請自備個人手提電腦及網路線。

sentences.english: Plus, laptops have to be out of their carriers.
sentences.chinese: 而且手提電腦也需要開包檢查。

sentences.english: Participants can use own computer for the course.
sentences.chinese: 參加者可自攜手提電腦出席。

sentences.english: Portable office Laptop bag lets you use your notebook without removing it from the bag.
sentences.chinese: 便攜式手提電腦包讓你無需從取出電腦即可使用。

sentences.english: H. "Yes, I'm a teacher, and I use my laptop form lessons."
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是一個老師，我常用手提電腦上課。
現在可好，手提電腦也能用了。

sentences.english: A laptop's battery and ventilation fan are two other suspected common culprits.
sentences.chinese: 手提電腦的電池和散熱風扇是另外兩個可能的原因。

sentences.english: Thank you for your letter of 7 July regarding your new laptop computer.
sentences.chinese: 7月7日有關新型號手提電腦函收悉。

sentences.english: A friend tells me that her husband takes his laptop into the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 一個朋友告訴我，她丈夫把手提電腦帶進了浴室。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
to lure into/to entrap/to trick into/to entice/to induce/to invite/to tempt
